"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546bad686368721351570000#post_546bad686368721351570000
How? Wild ferrets are aggresive, even if are domestic. Maybe it was from somewhere and it escaped from home? How much time you have her?

Also, about the red eyes, I am not so sure. My brother always told that, that mices with red eyes , ferrets with red eyes or hamters with red eyes tend to bite more or fight with other of their same species more frequently.

"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546bb24963687256e91b0300#post_546bb24963687256e91b0300
Sadly it was kind of like a weird over night thing, we just woke up one day and she was SUPER sick, like she didn't want to run around or do anything and that day it happen she sadly was gone in about a hour. So even if we got her to the vet they more then likely would have told us the sad news....

What we think happen is she got back out one day and we think she got something when she went outside? (I personally think my SHITTY step dad had something to do with it cuz he was a severe crap head when it came to animals)
